definition: natural phenomena of a seasonal nature
thing/object/matter/abbr. for physics 物理
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
the study of seasonal phenomena (flouring, migration etc)

sentences.english: At the same time, the response to the climate and pests in Enshi area were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，記錄了它在恩施的物候反應及病蟲害調查結果。

sentences.english: It is both on important and convenient method for forecasting phenological phases.
sentences.chinese: 用此種方法預報樹木物候期精度高而使用方便。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the phenological variation of chlorogenic acid in Flos Lonicerae from different localities.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討金銀花中綠原酸隨產地和物候期的變化規律。

sentences.english: The differences in growth rate and phenology are large .
sentences.chinese: 在生長速度和物候學上的差異是大的。

sentences.english: Finally, the phenological results indicate that the majority of high-risk plants flower the whole year.
sentences.chinese: 而物候學結果表示，高風險植物大部分是全年開花。

sentences.english: The conclusion showed that the changes of cricket phenology were the response of insect to climate warming.
sentences.chinese: 蟋蟀物候期變化是對氣候變暖響應的結果。

sentences.english: We have studied the phenological period of the 35 kinds of wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 對35種野生花卉的物候期進行了研究。

sentences.english: This is a new method of forecasting the phenological phases of woody plants by mean temperature recordings.
sentences.chinese: 利用平均溫度法預報樹木物候期是一種新的預報方法。

sentences.english: Phenology signals are clearer than changes in species distribution.
sentences.chinese: 物候變化是比物種分佈更爲清晰的信號。

definition: season/time of year
solar term
the 24 solar terms, calculated from the position of the sun on the ecliptic, that divide the year into 24 equal periods
agricultural activities
farming task
timing (of a signal or sequence)/time course
season
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
farmers' saying
the four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
Guyu or Grain Rain, 6th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th April-4th May
popular custom
